means: 使欣喜若狂，使着迷，使心醉( ravish的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She has no make - up on but she is ravishing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没有 化妆,但也很迷人.

sentence.Network_en: The film is ravishing to look at and boasts a sensuous musical score.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影画面迷人，配乐悦耳动听。

GRE逆序_馆档网 ... perishing 严寒的 ravishing 令人陶醉的 scathing (语言)苛刻的，严厉的.

entry.tran: 非常美丽的；销魂的；引人入胜的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as ravishing, you mean that they are very beautiful.

example.ex: ...driving through the ravishing scenery of Cumbria and Yorkshire.
example.tran: 开车经过风景如画的坎布里亚郡和约克郡
